thread.section_title: InterContinental Paris Le Grand - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Paris chic
thread.title_full: Paris chic - Review of InterContinental Paris Le Grand, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Ron J
title: Paris chic
text:
This is an old world Paris Hotel with all the modern amenities.
If you want old world charm with thick carpets, marble floors, rich fabrics, great beds, and service this is the place.
Located directly across the street from the Opera House and in the center of everything. Subway is just a short walk.
I highly recommend this hotel
